the Creator
Brahma
Saturn
This character leads the life of a scholar, poring over books and corresponding with the finest minds in the known world.
translation: 这名角色是天生的学者，以期超乎凡人的智慧穷毕生之精力去钻研书本当中的知识。

original: Midgets, shoes... No! [target_spy_on.GetFirstName] is having an affair with a feisty goat!
[target_spy_on.GetSubjectPronounCap] murdered a childhood friend at the tender age of 11!
translation: [target_spy_on.GetSubjectPronounCap]在十一岁的小小年纪就杀了一个玩伴！

original: [target_spy_on.GetSubjectPronounCap] has an imaginary friend called Bappo!
translation: [target_spy_on.GetSubjectPronounCap]给自己幻想了一个叫巴伯的朋友！

original: [target_spy_on.GetSubjectPronounCap] leads a secret life as a prostitute in a brothel in [target_spy_on.Capital.Capital.GetName]!
translation: [target_spy_on.GetSubjectPronounCap]一有机会就会去偷偷地跑到[target_spy_on.Capital.Capital.GetName]的妓院里去做鸡！

original: No, I can trust [intrigue_spymaster.GetObjectPronoun]
Aha! Now I can call off my spies.
translation: 呵呵！既然这样我的间谍就可以完成任务回来了。

original: I see, but I think it is time to spy on someone else.
translation: 我知道了，不过我觉得可以让间谍去继续打探些其他的消息。

original: No... I think it is time to spy on someone else.
translation: 不……我觉得我们应该去打探其他人的一些消息。

original: I am not having much luck spying on [FromFromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]. Perhaps I should focus my efforts elsewhere?
translation: 很不幸，我没能在[FromFromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]身上搞到什么有用的消息。也许我该关注下其他地方？

original: Yes, this is pointless.
No, I am sure [FromFromFrom.GetSubjectPronoun] is up to something...
translation: 不，我肯定[FromFromFrom.GetSubjectPronoun]应对什么事情负责……

original: The pressures of life no longer seem so overwhelming. I am not §YStressed§! anymore!
translation: 生活的压力已然渐渐褪去，我现在不再§Y紧张不安§!！

original: I woke up this morning with a big smile on my face. I am no longer Depressed!
translation: 今天我以微笑来迎接新一天的到来，我不再沮丧消沉！

original: You will not be able to change Focus again for §Y$YEARS$§! years!
translation: 在§Y$YEARS$§!年时间内你不能再次变更生活重心！

original: §RCannot be cancelled.§!
§RCannot be cancelled until §Y$DATE$§!§R.§!
Choose Focus
§RCannot change Focus until §Y$DATE$§!§R.§!

My [GetFromFromRelation], [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal], has asked me to spend some quality family time in [FromFrom.Capital.Capital.GetName]. I am sure the idea is for me to become better friends with [From.GetTitledName]...
translation: 我的[GetFromFromRelation]，[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal]，要求我多花一些时间留在[FromFrom.Capital.Capital.GetName]同家人在一起。我肯定这么做是为了增进同 [From.GetTitledName]之间的友谊……

original: Dishonest Duel
Magnificent Maze
This character's beautiful garden maze is known far beyond the realm for it's beauty.
translation: 这个角色的美丽的花园迷宫在国内远近闻名。

original: The Duel
[stonemason.GetSheHeCap] is not here right now. [stonemason.GetSheHeCap]'s got more important matters to deal with.
translation: [stonemason.GetSheHeCap]现在不在这里。[stonemason.GetSheHeCap]有更重要的事情去解决。

original: Fought Duel
This is considered dishonest and people might be upset about this act.
translation: 这在决斗中是不诚信的行为，其他人会因之而不满。

original: No, I don't want to fight my friends.
Is not an Ascetic\n
Duel Training
This character has recently been training the arts of duelling.
translation: 这人最近接受了决斗技巧的训练。
